entry.title: Pronto - 12 Oz Ripple Wall Hot Paper Cup Black - 25 / Sleeve
entry.summary:
Vendor: Pronto
Type: Disposables
Price: 5.49

Promote environmental friendliness with this compostable paper hot cup!

Both stylish and economical, this coffee cup is the perfect for your coffee shop, bistro, concession stand, or kiosk, minimizing waste, while ensuring efficiency. The innovative rippled wall on the outside of each cup keeps the surface warm to the touch, not hot like with comparable smooth surface cups. Use this cup to hold coffee, cappuccino, and piping hot lattes. This cup is the ideal way to serve hot beverages, to-go, to all of your customers!

Perfect for Hot Beverages

This hot cup is great for serving coffees, teas, hot chocolates, and lattes for your patrons on the go. Additionally, it features an eco-conscious PLA lining made from plant based starches that's able to withstand temperatures up to 200 degrees Fahrenheit.

Rolled Rim

The tightly rolled rim enables easy sipping and creates a secure seal when used with a compatible lid.

Promotes a Sustainable Planet

Once your guests have finished, the cup is compostable in commercial composting facilities and can be disposed of for fast clean up. Since it's composed of organic materials, it can be broken down naturally without damaging the environment and can help divert waste from landfills, effectively reducing pollution and promoting a more sustainable planet.

entry.title: EB - Kraft Paper Coffee Cup Sleeve For 10 - 20 Oz Hot Cup - 1350/Case
entry.summary:
Vendor: EB
Type: Disposables
Price: 48.99

Protect your customers' hands with this 10-20 oz. customizable coffee cup sleeve.

Eliminate the need to double cup your hot beverages with this coffee cup sleeve! A great addition to coffee shops, self-serve buffet lines, cafeterias, and office break rooms, this coffee sleeve provides a simple, practical solution to holding hot beverages.

Fits 10-20 oz. Cups

This sleeve easily slides over 8 oz. cups to provide an insulated layer of protection between hands and the hot surface. Simply stack coffee cup sleeves up next to your cups and lids at your break station, or place them in a compatible coffee cup sleeve dispenser for organized storage. It's also great for use with other hot drinks like tea and cider, too.

EB-SP-236 Kraft Paper Sleeve For 10 - 20 Oz Hot Cup Java Jacket

entry.title: E2E - 6 Oz Hot Paper Cups White - 50 / Sleeve
entry.summary:
Vendor: E2E
Type: Disposables
Price: 3.99

Serve guests your most popular hot or cold beverages with this white paper cup

This cup is the perfect beverage solution for your cafe, coffee shop, kiosk, concession stand, or convenience store. It features a crisp, white color that makes it easy to write a customer's name or order on the surface for easy identification, it has a space-saving construction, allowing it to be placed in a convenient cup dispenser for compact storage and easy accessibility. Plus, the convenient lid keeps drinks warm and protected as your guests take their coffee to go.

  • Great for serving coffee, tea, and hot chocolate
  • Ideal for on-the-go drink options
  • Features a crisp white coloring for versatility
  • Perfect for your break room, conference center, office, or concession stand
  • Sipping hole accepts stirrers and straws

    E2E - 6 oz Hot Paper Cups White - 50 / Sleeve
